alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Hanson; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 05 at 2:32PM MDT until April 07 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM CDT THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Beadle, Sanborn and Hanson Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 7 AM Wednesday to 1 AM CDT Thursday. For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM CDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
